_comment: Luna Installation Configuration - Choose one deployment mode

_deployment_mode_descriptions.ngrok: Tunnel mode for home networks without port forwarding (uses ngrok service)
_deployment_mode_descriptions.nip_io: Cloud VPS mode with auto-detected public IP and magic DNS (requires open ports 80/443)
_deployment_mode_descriptions.custom_domain: Production mode with your own domain (requires open ports 80/443 and manual DNS setup)

nip_io._comment: No configuration needed - public IP will be auto-detected

custom_domain._instructions: Set an A record in your DNS provider pointing to this machine's public IP before running install

caddy._comment: Basic auth credentials for accessing Luna Hub UI (applies to all deployment modes)
